title: How to Convert Pages to Word

steps.title: Open the Pages document you want converted to Word format.
steps.content: Open the Pages document you want converted to Word format.

steps.title: Click on “File,” point to “Export To,” and select “Word” from the submenu.
steps.content: Click on “File,” point to “Export To,” and select “Word” from the submenu. This will open the “Export Your Document” dialog box.

steps.title: Click on the “Word” tab, then click on the small arrow displayed to the left of “Advanced Options.
steps.content: Click on the “Word” tab, then click on the small arrow displayed to the left of “Advanced Options. ”

steps.title: Select your preferred Word document format from the options provided.
steps.content: Select your preferred Word document format from the options provided. To make the Pages document compatible with newer versions of Microsoft Word, select “.docx.” To make the Pages document compatible with Microsoft Word 1997 to 2004, select “.doc.”

steps.title: Click on “Next,” then type a name for the file into the “Save As” field.
steps.content: Click on “Next,” then type a name for the file into the “Save As” field.

steps.title: Indicate where you want the file saved using the “Where” field, then click on “Export.
steps.content: Indicate where you want the file saved using the “Where” field, then click on “Export. ” Your Pages document will now be converted to Word format and saved in the location specified. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Launch your internet browser and navigate to your favorite search engine.
steps.content: Launch your internet browser and navigate to your favorite search engine.

steps.title: Enter search terms such as “pages to word,” “pages to doc,” or “convert pages to word” to locate one or more third-party online services you can use to convert your document to Word.
steps.content: Enter search terms such as “pages to word,” “pages to doc,” or “convert pages to word” to locate one or more third-party online services you can use to convert your document to Word. Examples of services you can use are CloudConvert and Zamzar Online File Conversion. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Click on “browse” or “select” to choose the Pages file you want converted.
steps.content: Click on “browse” or “select” to choose the Pages file you want converted. The site will open a “browse” window that allows you to navigate to and select the Pages file on your computer.

steps.title: Select “doc” or “docx” from the format dropdown menu, if applicable.
steps.content: Select “doc” or “docx” from the format dropdown menu, if applicable. To make the Pages document compatible with newer versions of Microsoft Word, select “.docx.” To make the Pages document compatible with Microsoft Word 1997 to 2004, select “.doc.”

steps.title: Indicate how you want to be notified when the website finishes converting the document to Word.
steps.content: Indicate how you want to be notified when the website finishes converting the document to Word. In most cases, you’ll be required to provide your email address so the site can send you the converted file via email.

steps.title: Click on “Convert.
steps.content: Click on “Convert. ” The website will convert your Pages document to Word format, and send you the file using the method specified.
